name: ultrapure
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a substance) completely clean and not mixed with anything else: The tiny machines are sculpted out of the ultrapure silicon that is used to make microchips. The system is designed to filter out waste completely from the water so that the remaining water is ultra-pure.
More examplesFewer examplesThe factory produces the ultra-pure materials used in computers and other electronics. The vitamins contain ultra-pure Norwegian fish oils that contain high levels of Omega 3 and Omega 6 fatty acids.The spacecraft collected solar particles on hexagonal tiles of ultra-pure gold, sapphire, silicon or diamonds.
